entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 p.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.8Â°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
